description: The Request for Proposal (RFP) is for the acquisition of a Flow Cytometer including delivery, training and annual options for maintenance services after the warranty period.
full_summary:
# Flow Cytometer Procurement via Request for Proposal

## Notice Information

### Contracting Entity

* The procuring entity is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food (AAFC).
* The contracting entity's address is 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada.

### Solicitation Information

* Solicitation number: WS4171792494
* Solicitation amendment number: 1
* Publication date: 2023-12-11
* Tender closing date: 2024-01-04T14:00:00
* Amendment date: 2023-12-15
* Expected contract start date: 2023-09-30 (cancelled)
* Selection criteria: Lowest Price

## Tender Description

This Request for Proposal (RFP) is issued for the procurement of a Flow Cytometer. The requirement is to provide a Flow Cytometer, including delivery, training, and annual maintenance services after the warranty period. The site for this procurement is located in Sherbrooke, Quebec, Canada. 

## Notification of Cancellation

This solicitation cancels and supersedes the previous solicitation number 01B30-200778/A dated September 6, 2023. A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to bidders who bid on the previous solicitation.

## Trade Agreements

This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)

## Contact Information

* Therien, Renee-Ann (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: renee-ann.therien@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Phone: Not available

## Notice URL

The notice URL is [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18246613?extsite=MTgyNDY2MTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/182466
